Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Binary decision (0 or 1) to assign a specific worker to a specific task

Name: select_user_story_for_sprint
Description: Binary decision to include a user story in the next sprint backlog

Name: adjust_team_size
Description: The number of workers to assign to a specific team

Name: allocate_effort_to_task
Description: The amount of effort (in hours) to allocate for a task

Name: set_sprint_duration
Description: The duration of a sprint in calendar days

Name: set_story_points_for_user_story
Description: Fibonacci scale story points for a user story

Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: Binary decision to assign a whole team to a specific project

Name: choose_blocker_severity
Description: Severity level for a new blocker (1=low, 3=critical)

Name: approve_project_budget
Description: The total budget in currency units approved for a project

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary decision to include a feature in the upcoming release plan

Name: set_worker_availability
Description: Percentage of a worker's time available for the project
